About Me

Hello! I'm REYMOND SERVINO, a passionate and dedicated web developer with a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies. My journey in programming started when I was in senior high school, and since then, I've been constantly evolving to build innovative and user-friendly digital solutions.

With experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Java, I'm proficient in crafting visually appealing, responsive websites. I enjoy working on creating seamless user experiences, whether it's a dynamic web application or a static website.

I also have some experience with frameworks like Vue.js and Node.js, along with a solid understanding of RESTful APIs and version control systems like Git.

I'm passionate about learning new technologies and improving my coding practices. Whether it's adopting new design trends, experimenting with UI/UX principles, or diving into backend development, I’m always ready to take on new challenges.

Outside of coding, I have a love for problem-solving, listening to music, and reading. I believe in the power of continuous learning and strive to grow both professionally and personally. I’m always looking to collaborate on exciting projects that challenge me to push my boundaries.

Feel free to check out my projects and connect with me if you’re interested in working together or just want to chat about tech!
